channel.title: Looking for coder & Web Designer
channel.description:
Okay so i do not how to start this off but here it goes.. Okay so " Illusion-X" was my project last year we lasted for like 5-6 months we reached 40+ players daily. Right now i do not have that much time i can not code the server, due to the lack of time. And the website side... the other owner he doesnt not play rsps anymore so he doesnt help me so thats why i need a webdesigner. So ill give you a special rank on my server. and when we get donations... ull get a a bit from them.
[b] Requirements For Web-Designer[/b] - Know how to use SMF - Be good at HTML and other codes. - How to add basic stuff - Have time to do it. [b] Requirements For Coder[/b] - Ofc know hot to code - how to make webclients - in request make update regularly - respect to owner and other staff
ALL PEOPLE SHOULD BE MATUER.
add me on skye: nika443 or pm me on here
THANK YOU, Illusion-X staff!
